item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I have claimed that Escape is one of the main functions of fairy-stories, and since I do not disapprove of them, it is plain that I do not accept the tone of scorn or pity with which 'Escape' is now so often used. Why should a man be scorned if, finding himself in prison, he tries to get out and go home? Or if he cannot do so, he thinks and talks about other topics than jailers and prison-walls?" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "It's like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a <i>story</i>." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Daphne Rae
item.description: "I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love." -- Daphne Rae

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I'm on Aslan's side even if there isn't any Aslan to lead it. I'm going to live as like a Narnian as I can even if there isn't any Narnia." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Once a King in Narnia, always a King in Narnia. But don't go trying to use the same route twice. Indeed, don't try to get there at all. It'll happen when you're not looking for it. And don't talk too much about it even among yourselves. And don't mention it to anyone else unless you find that they've had adventures of the same sort themselves. What's that? How will you know? Oh, you'll know all right. Odd things, they say-even their looks-will let the secret out. Keep your eyes open. Bless me, what do they teach them at these schools." -The Profesor" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Onward and Upward! To Narnia and the North!" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Feeling like the voice she liked best in all the world was calling her name." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You come of the Lord Adam and the Lady Eve," said Aslan. "And that is both honour enough to erect the head of the poorest beggar, and shame enough to bow the shoulders of the greatest emperor on earth. Be content." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Artemis Girl add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Certainly, Lu. Whatever you like,' said Peter unexpectedly. This was encouraging, but as Peter instantly rolled round and went to sleep again it wasn't much use." -- C.S. Lewis
